title: Conway

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Iterate your target through one iteration of Conway's Game of Life.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you target an alive player, and at least one of their neighbors is dead, they will die.
- If you target a dead player, and both of their neighbors are alive, they will be revived.
- You may not kill once you have killed three players nor may you revive after you have revived a player.
- You have Basic Defense until you are attacked for the first time.
- You may not kill yourself, but you may revive yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill three players and revive one player.

desc:
Post 273
*This is a matter of life and death.*
